resources.string: This channel is for high priority messages
This channel is for normal priority messages
This channel is for low priority messages

string-array.name: phrases
string-array.item: I will not buy this record, it is scratched.
My hovercraft is full of eels.
Do you want to come back to my place, bouncy bouncy?
If I said you had a beautiful body, would you hold it against me?
Drop your panties, Sir William, I cannot wait till lunchtime.
